name: Pluck: A Berry Sweet Adventure
description:
In this berry sweet adventure two friends, a peach named Pilar and a blueberry named Berto, travel the world to find each other. Along the way they grow a magical garden and with the help of sidekicks defeat rascals. Adorable characters, delightful music, and brilliant animations create endless discovery in this cutting edge matching game.

Featuring:
• Grow sunflowers, moonberries, mushrooms, and much more.
• Challenge yourself in a beautiful, hexagonal, match-3 adventure with tricky rascals and fun sidekick boosts.
• Match fruits and collect coins to beat levels, then use them to expand and decorate your garden.
• Harvest your garden and use what you grow to train sidekick boosters that will help beat new matching levels.
• A delightful story of two friends who get lost on the way to find each other.
• Meet adorable characters, feed your animals, trade, fish, and discover all the ways to play Pluck!
